feed.title: Spliit Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Spliit: 1.13.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix Dockerfile by @bitgroestl in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/206
  • Fix missing translation for expense title for reinbursement in expense-form by @totti-rdz in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/244
  • [translation] Add Polish language by @pktiuk in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/243

New Contributors

  • @bitgroestl made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/206
  • @totti-rdz made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/244
  • @pktiuk made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/243

Full Changelog: https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/compare/1.12.0...1.13.0

entry.title: New release for Spliit: 1.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add tRPC, use it for group expenses, balances and information page by @scastiel in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/246
  • Use tRPC in other group pages by @scastiel in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/249
  • Use tRPC for group create form by @scastiel in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/250
  • Use tRPC for expense form by @scastiel in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/251
  • Improve Italian translation by @marco-sciuto in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/245
  • Add Romanian translations by @stefansn in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/248

New Contributors

  • @marco-sciuto made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/245
  • @stefansn made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/248

Full Changelog: https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/compare/1.13.0...1.14.0

entry.title: New release for Spliit: 1.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Default currency symbol by @sebiweise in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/259
  • [Translation] Add Traditional Chinese (zh-TW) by @icarusxxy in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/260
  • feat(expense-list): Display the attachment count only when the expense includes attachments by @yuvarajsai in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/267
  • fix: utc timezone used in activity tracker by @sbeaury in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/265

New Contributors

  • @sebiweise made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/259
  • @icarusxxy made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/260
  • @yuvarajsai made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/267
  • @sbeaury made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/265

Full Changelog: https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/compare/1.14.1...1.15.0

entry.title: New release for Spliit: 1.16.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix the amount validation while creating an expense by @yuvarajsai in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/291
  • Feat: Add export to CSV support by @yuvarajsai in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/292
  • Create tr-TR.json by @hasanunal in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/296
  • Fixes in Italian translations by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/301
  • Fix typo in German translation by @marrrc in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/303
  • Ensure the exported data is sorted by the expense date by @allenzwyang in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/306
  • Inclusion of pt-BR.json language file. by @evertonluiz in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/308
  • Fixes in polish translation by @pktiuk in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/285
  • Add expense category 'Life/Donation' by @lorenzleutgeb in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/315
  • Fix typo in translation files by @totti-rdz in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/318
  • Fix typos in de-DE translation (Fixes #321) by @geberl in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/322
  • Add Dutch translation by @Petersmit27 in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/324
  • Use exec in container entryptoint to replace the shell process by @TheEdgeOfRage in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/326
  • Remove unnecessary interpolation (?) dollar signs by @olegbonar in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/319
  • Fix typos in i18n keys for Expenses.Groups.lastYear and Activity.Groups.lastYear for most locales by @scott113341 in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/270
  • Add computed shares per expense to fix #127 by @Tyde in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/269
  • docker compose: allow to build container and use interanl network by @6543 in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/320
  • feature(pwa): add multiple custom size transparent PNGs by @yuvarajsai in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/271
  • Add recurring expense functionality by @trandall2 in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/263

New Contributors

  • @hasanunal made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/296
  • @albanobattistella made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/301
  • @marrrc made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/303
  • @allenzwyang made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/306
  • @evertonluiz made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/308
  • @lorenzleutgeb made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/315
  • @geberl made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/322
  • @Petersmit27 made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/324
  • @TheEdgeOfRage made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/326
  • @olegbonar made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/319
  • @scott113341 made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/270
  • @Tyde made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/269
  • @6543 made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/320
  • @trandall2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/pull/263

Full Changelog: https://github.com/spliit-app/spliit/compare/1.15.0...1.16.0
